name: Springbroid
description:
This is Springbroid, a security robot for a weapons factory. Triggered by the alarm! Journey by jumping and punching off walls to make your way to the end of the level without dying

Controls:

Walking = A and D

Punching = K(Left Punch) L(Right Punch)

Jumping = S + K or L

Punch off of walls to aquire further distance.

**Please note this is an early prototype, we know it might be clunky and not all of the art is final!**
